name: Microsoft
description: InMage offers major advancements in Backup (BU) and Disaster Recovery (DR) technology for Enterprises and Managed Service Providers (MSP’s). Traditionally Enterprises use multiple products for BU/DR; one for virtual another for physical and yet another for UNIX and databases while still using target dedupe and additional products for replication purposes alone. InMage eliminates this disparate mix of products through a unified solution that consolidates all of the Data Protection needs under one umbrella. InMage’s software based on True Continuous Data Protection (CDP) provides unified protection for Enterprise and Hybrid Cloud environments and meets the strictest Recovery Point and Recovery Time Objectives (RPO/RTO) Service Level Agreements (SLAs).InMage software builds upon deep application awareness that helps guarantee recovery of complex multi-tier applications. This includes mission critical applications such as ERP (SAP and others) Databases (SQL Oracle DB2 and others) and Messaging (Exchange and similar products). InMage’s technology is the key vehicle that leverages the Cloud for Data Protection; analytics and reporting; connecting Enterprises to Clouds (Private Public Hybrid); and Protection for the Cloud. These major distinctions are the reason that InMage cannot be compared with traditional Backup or Disaster Recovery software.DR in the Cloud is being driven by energetic customer adoption and MSP’s that are responding with Disaster Recovery as a Service (DRaaS). InMage offers BU/DR and Cloud platform software for DRaaS - ScoutCloud - addressing the broadest base in both Operating Systems and Hypervisors (Windows Linux AIX VMware XenServer Hyper-V). InMage has a Multi-Tenant ready-to-deploy POD to enable MSPs to launch a service in a fraction of the time compared to traditional methods resulting in the fastest go-to-market time. InMage offers flexibility in deployment; customers can deploy ScoutCloud into existing Cloud infrastructure or engage the InMage turn-key Value and Enterprise PODs. InMage’s software hardware expertise knowledge and experience are the backbone of DRaaS by the largest number of local regional and global MSP’s. InMage provides MSP’s with a strong foundation to drive service offerings to and within the Cloud. This includes Near Zero impact Migration to the Cloud; DR as a Service for the Cloud; and DR as a service INTO the Cloud. MSP’s can now offer value-added services in the Cloud such as Reporting and Analytics in the Cloud in addition to DR. With InMage MSP’s have an easy-to-use single platform for Migration to the Cloud Cloud Mobility DRaaS Cloud Data Protection and Cloud Analytics designed for Cloud integration (Private Public and Hybrid Clouds). InMage addresses key problems of today’s Enterprises.InMage Scout is the BU and DR solution for companies that want to simplify data protection across a diverse IT environment while scaling to larger environments. Scout BU/DR test and reporting tools are designed to support Application Lifecycle Management; and assures unified protection with a single management interface. The platform supports the rapid deployment of critical applications such as SAP Exchange and Databases because testing can be done on production data with no operational constraints and no increased cost of storage.

name: VNU Exhibitions Asia Ltd.
description: This company is a joint venture of Jaarbeurs and Keylong Exhibitions Service Co.,Ltd.. As one of the earliest exhibition companies in the country, VNU Exhibitions Asia has been a leader in China's exhibition industry for more than two decades. Through the joint efforts of more than 200 outstanding employees, the company hosts over 20 top exhibitions and conferences in China each year, with a total exhibition area of over 600,000 square meters. The company is headquartered in Shanghai.As an important member of Jaarbeurs, a 100-year-old European enterprise, VNU Exhibitions Asia has a wealth of operational experience in domestic exhibitions, and has been widely praised by industry partners for its excellent international resources and brand influence. The company is a member of Union of International Fairs (UFI) and Level A Qualification Unit of Shanghai Convention & Exhibition Industries Association (SCEIA).VNU Exhibitions Asia has founded numerous self-owned branded exhibitions with international influence, including Pet Fair Asia, Shanghai International Money Fair, Shanghai World Travel Fair, International Building Industrialization of Construction Exhibition Asia, and HORTI CHINA. Meanwhile, the company has introduced and extensively grown a series of world-renowned branded exhibitions to the Chinese market, such as DOMOTEX asia/CHINAFLOOR , R+T Asia, TCT Asia, Salone del Mobile.Milano Shanghai, and VIV China. Over the past 20 years, VNU Exhibitions Asia has gradually formed its unique characteristics – “glocalization for both local and international projects”. Currently the company has the largest number of self-owned branded exhibitions, and introduced the most international branded exhibitions in China.In order to meet the development needs of the rapid industry transformation under the new economic situation, VNU Exhibitions Asia will adopt a comprehensive strategic plan for its group development and global deployment. In the future, the company will be driven by information technologies and innovation, continue to take advantage of its ability to integrate resources, and further explore the core fields within the four major sections of construction, lifestyle, agriculture and industry. Innovative business such as conferences and media will be launched and added to the company portfolio too. VNU Exhibitions Asia will strive to create a new China model leading the global exhibition industry.
